paper_abstract: We present Frequency Analyser, an Android(TM) application for measuring the fundamental frequency of a sound wave with very high precision in a frequency range between 100Hz and 11kHz. The application allows exporting the data of frequency as a function of time to an ASCII file. Several examples of application to Physics and Engineering teaching experiments are presented. (c) 2015 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Comput Appl Eng Educ 23:471-476, 2015; View this article online at ; DOI
paper_title: Frequency Analyser: A New Android Application for High Precision Frequency Measurement
